value.title: DAX Fridays #208: Open orders in DAX | Events in progress & Time intelligence
value.excerpt: In today's video, we are going to go through how to think about Time Intelligence calculations with a specific case: Calculating the number of open orders using DAX. value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
